file.name: api.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Trading API
  description: A generic trading API for stock markets. 
  version: 0.1.0
  
servers: 
  - url: https://localhost
  
paths:
  /profile:
    get:
      summary: User profile
      description: Get the user profile
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Returns a dictionary of user properties
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Profile'
  /orders:
    get:
      summary: List of orders
      description: Gets the list of all orders placed for the day
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Returns a list of dictionaries for each of the orders
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items: 
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/Order'
                  
  /order_cancel/{id}:
    post:
      summary: Cancel an order
      description: Given an order id, cancel an order
      parameters: 
        - in: path
          name: id
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
            description: Given an order id, cancel an order
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Response from provider
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Message'
                
                  
  /trades:
    get:
      summary: List of trades
      description: Gets the list of all trades
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Returns a list of all trades
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/Trade'
                  
  /positions:
    get:
      summary: List of positions
      description: Gets the list of all positions
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Returns a list of all positions
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/Position'
                  
components:
  schemas:
    Profile:
      type: object
      properties:
        id: 
          type: string
        name:
          type: string
        email:
          type: string
          
    Order:
      type: object
      additionalProperties: true
      properties:
        order_id:
          type: integer
        order_timestamp:
          type: string
        symbol:
          type: string
        price:
          type: number
        quantity:
          type: number
        order_type:
          type: string
        side:
          type: string
        filled_quantity:
          type: string
        status:
          type: string
          
    Trade:
      type: object
      additionalProperties: true
      properties:
        trade_id:
          type: integer
        order_id:
          type: integer
        timestamp:
          type: string
        symbol:
          type: string
        price:
          type: number
        quantity:
          type: integer
        side:
          type: string
          
    Position:
      type: object
      additionalProperties: true
      properties:
        symbol:
          type: string
        quantity:
          type: integer
        side:
          type: string
        average_price:
          type: number
    
    Quote:
      type: object
      properties:
        symbol:
          type: string
        open:
          type: number
        high:
          type: number
        low:
          type: number
        close:
          type: number
        ltp:
          type: number
        volume:
          type: number
        ltt:
          type: string
          description: last traded timestamp
          
    Message:
      type: object
      additionalProperties: true
      properties:
        code:
          type: integer
          description: A numeric code indicating the success or failure of the transaction
        id:
          type: integer
          description: The corresponding identifier usually an order id  or a trade id
        message:
          type: string
          description: A detailed message of what really happened from the provider
